FuncDef:
The password command configures the password used for the quotas application sent to the server by the prepaid services.
The undo password command deletes the password.
By default, no password used for the quotas application sent to the server by the prepaid services is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a ciphertext password.
The new password is at least eight characters long and contains at least two of the following types: upper-case letters, lower-case letters, digits, and special characters.
unencrypted password: The value is a string of 1 to 16 characters.encrypted password: The value is a string of 1 to 128 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the authentication mode for the application sent by the prepaid service is RADIUS, you need to configure the password to access the RADIUS server.
Configuration Impact
After a password is configured for a prepaid profile, a device uses this password to apply for a prepaid service quota from the RADIUS server.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
